row.entry: This value set specifies the how the content of assessment being exchanged is used.
This code specifies that the assessment is applicable to clinical evaluation of the patient.
This code specifies that the assessment is applicable for research.

The value ProgramEvaluation identifies types of patients and problems presenting for treatment, quantifies level of problems, measures patients response to treatment, identifies agencies /workers strengths and areas for improvement with particular populations and problems, enables management by outcome, reports to funding sources, etc.
